{"id":537390495,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1628778337,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"124 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/537390495/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"25 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        int sz = nums.size();\n        \n        set<vector<int>> output;\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < sz; ++i) {\n            if(i && nums[i] == nums[i - 1]) continue;\n            int k = sz - 1;\n            \n            for(int j = i + 1; j < sz; ++j) {\n                while(k > j && nums[k] + nums[i] + nums[j] > 0) --k;\n                if(k > j && nums[k] + nums[i] + nums[j] == 0) {\n                    vector<int> v = {nums[i], nums[j], nums[k]};\n                    sort(v.begin(), v.end());\n                    \n                    output.insert(v);\n                }\n                while(k > j && nums[k] + nums[i] + nums[j] == 0) --k;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return vector<vector<int>>(output.begin(), output.end());\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum"}
